      • getConstructor

        public static <T> Constructor<T> getConstructor(Class<T> clazz)
                                         throws SecurityException,
                                                NoSuchMethodException
        Returns the empty argument constructor of the class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - class type variable.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class reference of given type T.
        Returns:
        constructor for the given class type T.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the caller's class loader is not the same as the class loader of above class.
        NoSuchMethodException - default construct cannot by found for given class type.

      • hasConstructor

        public static boolean hasConstructor(Class<?> clazz)
                              throws SecurityException,
                                     NoSuchMethodException
        Returns whether the class defines an empty argument constructor.
        Parameters:
        clazz - class reference of given type T.
        Returns:
        boolean indicating constructor for the given class type T exist.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the caller's class loader is not the same as the class loader of above class.
        NoSuchMethodException - default construct cannot by found for given class type.

      • newInstance

        public static <T> T newInstance(Class<T> clazz)
                         throws InstantiationException,
                                IllegalAccessException,
                                SecurityException,
                                NoSuchMethodException,
                                IllegalArgumentException,
                                InvocationTargetException
        Constructs a new instance of the class using the no-arg constructor.
        Type Parameters:
        T - class type variable.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the object.
        Returns:
        a new instance of the object.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the caller's class loader is not the same as the class loader of above class.
        IllegalArgumentException - this will not be thrown since field.get(obj) passing obj is null since the field is a static class level variable inside the class.
        IllegalAccessException - if the field is inaccessible due to java language access control.
        InstantiationException - could not be instantiated from the given constructor.
        NoSuchMethodException - default construct cannot by found for given class type.
        InvocationTargetException - if the underlying constructor throws an exception.

      • newInstance

        public static Object newInstance(String classStr)
                          throws InstantiationException,
                                 IllegalAccessException,
                                 ClassNotFoundException,
                                 SecurityException,
                                 IllegalArgumentException,
                                 NoSuchMethodException,
                                 InvocationTargetException
        Constructs a new instance of the class using the no-arg constructor.
        Parameters:
        classStr - the class name of the object.
        Returns:
        a new instance of the object.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the caller's class loader is not the same as the class loader of above class.
        IllegalArgumentException - this will not be thrown since field.get(obj) passing obj is null. since the field is a static class level variable inside the class.
        IllegalAccessException - if the field is inaccessible due to java language access control.
        ClassNotFoundException - class definition cannot be found for the class type.
        InstantiationException - could not be instantiated from the given constructor.
        NoSuchMethodException - default construct cannot by found for given class type.
        InvocationTargetException - if the underlying constructor throws an exception.

      • getStaticField

        public static Object getStaticField(Class<?> clazz,
                                    String fieldName)
                             throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                    SecurityException,
                                    IllegalAccessException,
                                    NoSuchFieldException
        Returns the value of a named static field.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class of the object.
        fieldName - field name of the instance which value is required.
        Returns:
        a new instance of the object.
        Throws:
        SecurityException - if the caller's class loader is not the same as the class loader of above class.
        NoSuchFieldException - if a field with the specified name is not found.
        IllegalArgumentException - this will not be thrown since field.get(obj) passing obj is null since the field is a static class level variable inside the class.
        IllegalAccessException - if the field is inaccessible due to java language access control.
